mapper.sql: mphpkio.ht_producttion_key_issues_order_id, mphpkio.producttion_key_issues_order_id, mphpkio.work_order_id, mphpkio.material_id, mphpkio.`status`, mphpkio.remark, mphpkio.org_id, mphpkio.create_user_id, mphpkio.create_time, mphpkio.modified_user_id, mphpkio.modified_time, mphpkio.is_delete, mphpkio.option1, mphpkio.option2, mphpkio.option3
mapper.select:
SELECT, bm.material_code,bm.material_name,bm.material_desc,bm.material_version,bmt.material_property,mpwo.work_order_code, su.user_name as create_user_name, sus.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name FROM fantech_imes_v2.mes_pm_ht_producttion_key_issues_order mphpkio left join fantech_imes_v2.mes_pm_work_order mpwo on mphpkio.work_order_id=mpwo.work_order_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_material bm on mphpkio.material_id=bm.material_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_material_tab bmt on bm.material_id=bmt.material_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user su ON mphpkio.create_user_id = su.user_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user sus ON mphpkio.modified_user_id = sus.user_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_organization bo ON mphpkio.org_id = bo.organization_id
and mpwo.work_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCode}, '%')
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and bm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
and mphpkio.status = #{status}
and date_format(mphpkio.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by mphpkio.create_time desc
